full_description:
Business Analyst (Edison, NJ) (Multiple Openings) Design & develop process flow diagrams using Oracle Business Process Management tool (OBPM) to develop the as-is and to-be diagrams to simulate the process flow; develop domain models, logical & physical data models for Oracle, SQL Server databases using ERWIN tool.; Create & manage Business Requirements, Functional Requirements, Use Cases & traceability relationships in Rational Requisite Pro; create Use Case specifications, Business Flow diagrams, Activity/state diagram & Sequence diagram using Rational Rose; develop complex database queries & manually building data for database loads for testing using SQL Developer & TOAD; design & develop reports generated by Cognos reporting tool; develop the test plans & detailed test cases, execute the test cases & logging/tracking the defects in HP Quality Center. Travel to multiple client locations nationwide. Must have Bachelors in computers/ electronics/ related + 1 year exp as Programmer Analyst/Soft. Engineer/ Developer/ related. Respond to HR Manager, Job ID: BA/RM/14, MPower Logic, Inc., 7 Lincoln Highway, Suite # 227B, Edison, NJ 08820.
\n
We have these immediate opportunities for our data management and KPO center. If you have what we are looking for, please apply online (Apply Online) or e-mail your resume to resumes@mpowerlogic.com
